BetterVPS is a new Premium Managed KVM VPS provider. Yes, you read that right, it's managed! All VPS's include basic management, which includes initial configuration of cPanel, etc. Full Management will soon become available for an additional cost.

Anyway, our Virtual Private Servers are on Incero network. Each VPS is on a shared Gigabit port.

For our beta launch we've opened stock of the "Better One" plan:

512MB RAM 2 Virtual CPUs 20GB Storage 1TB Monthly Transfer 1 IP Address

Use promo code BETA for recurring 50% off, so $5/month! Direct order link: https://www.bettervps.com/account/cart.php?a=add&pid=1 Our website, which is still a work in progress: https://www.bettervps.com/

A test hostname you can ping is dallas.speedtest.bettervps.com, IP 162.212.56.113.

We do not give access to a control panel however basic things like reboot, shutdown, VNC, etc. are in the client area. Please open tickets to the appropriate department for rDNS and Reinstallation. Instant activation has been disabled during the beta period. Your VPS will be online quickly, though :)
